divs: sighting details'miniature u.f.o. in flight' on saturday night april 5, 2008 around 1:30 a.m. in burton michigan k and c finished up our shopping at kroger in davison michigan. the following event took place while we were driving west on davison road (near center road) toward k's house in flint. at approximately 1:30am, we passed by chase bank in burton and the both of us noticed something unusual flying in front of us. street lights lit up the area. both of us agreed that the creature appeared to be flying 3 1\2 feet above the ground heading south. c. was driving the vehicle. when she turned her head from glancing at the chase bank (on her left) to face the road,a flying creature appeared in her right peripheral vision. it moved very fast. c. quickly looked at the creature as it flew in the direction of the chase bank before disappearing. c. didn't notice any wings on the creature, but, for a minute, she noticed a nearly 5 inch furry brown colored body for 2 seconds. then it turned into a small 1 1\2 inch shape. the creature was flying horizontally before nose diving another 1\2 foot towards the ground before reaching the other side of the road. then it disappeared. k. was sitting in the passenger seat and looking straight ahead when he noticed the bizarre u.f.o. he caught a glimpse of what appeared to be a cigarette butt thrown from a window. but as k. followed it with his eyes, he noticed it was too big to be a cigarette butt. it had the appearance of a bright orange christmas tree light or an orange globe. the size of it was 1 1\2 inches it appeared to be 3 1\2 feet off the ground. the creature moved perfectly horizontally slightly rising by the time it reached the middle of the road. it looked like it slightly dipped maybe 1\2 foot before it reached the other side of the road. when it reached the other side of the road it was gone. it vanished. k. and c. agreed the event lasted about 8 seconds and the u.f.o. just a little bit faster then a bird or a bat. they speculate that this may have been a fairy experience.

Summary: Miniature U.F.O. in flight... possible fairy experience observed by 2 people while driving
